SEARCH
Package com.example.atlasevents

Class LotteryService

java.lang.Object
com.example.atlasevents.LotteryService
public class LotteryService extends Object
Service class for handling lottery draws for event waitlists. Manages random selection of entrants from waitlists and handles notifications for acceptance/decline. Includes registration date validation for lottery availability. and cooldown for lottery re-run checking if accepted list is below entrant limit version 1.2 : removing cooldown logic and opting for manual re-sampling
See Also:
  • Event
  • NotificationRepository
  • Entrant

  • Method Details

    • drawLottery

      public void drawLottery(@NonNull String eventId, @NonNull LotteryService.LotteryCallback callback)
      Draws a lottery for the specified event. Randomly selects entrants from the waitlist up to the event's entrant limit, considering already accepted entrants. Sends notifications to selected entrants.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to draw lottery for
      callback - Callback to handle the result of the lottery draw
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if eventId is null or empty
      See Also:
      • Event
      • LotteryService.LotteryCallback

    • checkLotteryAvailability

      public LotteryService.LotteryAvailability checkLotteryAvailability(@NonNull Event event)
      Checks if lottery can be run for the event based on cooldown and available slots
      Parameters:
      event - The event to check
      Returns:
      LotteryAvailability object with status and message

    • isLotteryAvailable

      public boolean isLotteryAvailable(@NonNull Event event)
      Checks if lottery is available for the event based on registration end date. Lottery becomes available after the registration end date has passed.
      Parameters:
      event - The event to check
      Returns:
      true if lottery is available, false otherwise

    • getTimeUntilLotteryAvailable

      public long getTimeUntilLotteryAvailable(@NonNull Event event)
      Calculates the time remaining until lottery becomes available.
      Parameters:
      event - The event to check
      Returns:
      Time remaining in milliseconds, or 0 if lottery is available or date invalid

    • calculateAvailableSlots

      protected int calculateAvailableSlots(Event event)
      Calculates available slots for the lottery draw. Considers entrant limit and already accepted entrants.
      Parameters:
      event - The event to calculate slots for
      Returns:
      Number of available slots

    • autoResampleForDecline

      public void autoResampleForDecline(String eventId, String declinedEntrantEmail, LotteryService.LotteryCallback callback)
      Automatically resamples from waitlist when an entrant declines an invitation
      Parameters:
      eventId - The event ID
      declinedEntrantEmail - The email of the entrant who declined
      callback - Callback for result handling

    • handleInvitationResponse

      public void handleInvitationResponse(String eventId, String entrantEmail, boolean accepted, LotteryService.InvitationResponseCallback callback)
      Handles invitation response from entrant
      Parameters:
      eventId - The event ID
      entrantEmail - The entrant's email
      accepted - Whether the invitation was accepted

    • resampleLottery

      public void resampleLottery(@NonNull String eventId, @NonNull LotteryService.LotteryCallback callback)
      Re-samples the lottery, replacing pending invites with new selections
      Parameters:
      eventId - The event ID
      callback - Callback for result handling
